name: Android Development
postCreateCommand: export ANDROID_HOME=/usr/local/android-sdk && mkdir -p $ANDROID_HOME && wget https://dl.google.com/android/repository/commandlinetools-linux-8512546_latest.zip -O /tmp/cmdline-tools.zip && unzip /tmp/cmdline-tools.zip -d /tmp/cmdline-tools && mv /tmp/cmdline-tools/cmdline-tools/ $ANDROID_HOME/cmdline-tools && yes | $ANDROID_HOME/cmdline-tools/bin/sdkmanager --licenses && $ANDROID_HOME/cmdline-tools/bin/sdkmanager 'platform-tools' 'platforms;android-34' 'system-images;android-34;google_apis;x86_64' && echo 'export PATH=$PATH:$ANDROID_HOME/platform-tools:$ANDROID_HOME/cmdline-tools/bin' >> ~/.bashrc
